verses.verse: And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H3427>passed<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H758>Aram<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> that Ramoth-gilead belongs to us, and we are <S%H2814>still<s%> <S%H2814>doing<s%> <S%H2814>nothing<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> it out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%>?"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "Will you <S%H1980>go<s%> with me to <S%H4421>battle<s%> at Ramoth-gilead?" And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "I am as you are, my <S%H5971>people<s%> as your <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H5483>horses<s%> as your <S%H5483>horses.<s%>"

Moreover, <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H3117>first<s%> for the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> together, about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Ramoth-gilead to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> shall I <S%H2308>refrain<s%>?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up, for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> [it] into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"
But <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is <S%H369>there<s%> not <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of him?"

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "There is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by whom we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but I <S%H8130>hate<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> he does not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, but <S%H9563>evil.<s%> [He is] <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah.<s%>" But <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let not the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4116>"Bring<s%> <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah.<s%>"

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in [their] <S%H899>robes,<s%> at the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> for himself and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'With <S%H428>these<s%> you shall <S%H5055>gore<s%> the <S%H758>Arameans<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they are <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>'"

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> <S%H3651>thus,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up to Ramoth-gilead and <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> [it] into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7121>summon<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H259>uniformly<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H2896>favorable<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> <S%H4994>Please<s%> let your <S%H1697>word<s%> be like the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>favorably.<s%>"
But <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3588>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> to me, that I will <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"

When he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4321>"Micaiah,<s%> shall we <S%H1980>go<s%> to Ramoth-gilead to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> shall we <S%H2308>refrain<s%>?" And he <S%H559>answered<s%> him, <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up and <S%H6743>succeed,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> [it] into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5704>"How<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H5704>many<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> must I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me <S%H3808>nothing<s%> but the <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?"

So he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6327>Scattered<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> Like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>'These<s%> have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H113>master.<s%> Let <S%H376>each<s%> of them <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "Did I not <S%H559>tell<s%> you that he would not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, but <S%H9563>evil<s%>?"

And Micaiah <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on His <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> by Him on His <S%H3225>right<s%> and on His <S%H8040>left.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> will <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H5307>fall<s%> at Ramoth-gilead?' And <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>this<s%> while <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that.
"Then a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forward<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H6601>entice<s%> him.'

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>'How<s%>?' And he <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H3318>go<s%> out and be a <S%H8267>deceiving<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>' Then He <S%H559>said,<s%> 'You are to <S%H6601>entice<s%> [him] and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3201>prevail.<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H8267>deceiving<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>proclaimed<s%> <S%H9567>disaster<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you."

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H335>"How<s%> <S%H2088><s%> did the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> from me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you?"

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> yourself."

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> him to <S%H526>Amon<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and to <S%H3060>Joash<s%> the king's <S%H1121>son;<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7760>"Put<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> man in <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H3608><s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> him <S%H3906>sparingly<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>return<s%> <S%H7965>safely.<s%>"' "

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H7725>indeed<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7965>safely<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by me." And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up against Ramoth-gilead.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "I will <S%H2664>disguise<s%> myself and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> but you <S%H3847>put<s%> on your <S%H899>robes.<s%>" So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the thirty-two <S%H8269>captains<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H9512>small<s%> or <S%H1419>great,<s%> but with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H905>alone.<s%>"

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely<s%> it is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" and they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> out.

Then it <S%H1961>happened,<s%> when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was not the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H310>pursuing<s%> him.

Now a certain <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4900>drew<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%> at <S%H8537>random<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in a <S%H1694>joint<s%> of the <S%H8302>armor.<s%> So he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7395>driver<s%> of his <S%H7395>chariot,<s%> <S%H2015>"Turn<s%> <S%H3027>around,<s%> and <S%H3318>take<s%> me out of the <S%H4264>fight;<s%> for I <S%H2470>am<s%> <S%H2470>severely<s%> <S%H2470>wounded.<s%>"

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5927>raged<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H5975>propped<s%> up in his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> in <S%H5227>front<s%> of the <S%H758>Arameans,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> from the <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H3332>ran<s%> into the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

Then a <S%H7440>cry<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>throughout<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> close to <S%H8121>sunset,<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376>"Every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>country.<s%>"
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And they <S%H7857>washed<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> by the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>licked<s%> up his <S%H1818>blood<s%> (now the <S%H2181>harlots<s%> <S%H7364>bathed<s%> themselves [there]), according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> and the <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?
So <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers, and <S%H1>Ahaziah<s%> his <S%H274>son<s%> <S%H1121>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Now <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> was thirty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> twenty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7977>Shilhi.<s%>

And he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the way of <S%H609>Asa<s%> his father; he did not <S%H1>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from it, <S%H5493>doing<s%> <S%H6213>right<s%> in the <S%H3477>sight<s%> of the <S%H5869>Lord.<s%> <S%H3068>However,<s%> the <S%H389>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> were not <S%H1116>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away;<s%> the <S%H5493>people<s%> <S%H5971>still<s%> <S%H5750>sacrificed<s%> and <S%H2076>burnt<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H6999>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>
<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> also <S%H7999>made<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
